author: Eun-Young Jeong
title: Prosecutors Seek 30-Year Prison Term for Former South Korean President
text:
SEOUL—Prosecutors sought a 30-year prison sentence and a $110 million fine for South Korea’s former president for her involvement in a corruption scandal that brought down her administration and led to the jailing of high-ranking government officials and business leaders. 
On Tuesday, prosecutors called Park Geun-hye “the final responsible person” in the wide-ranging affair, as they gave their recommendations in a court hearing in Seoul.
...
